pageContent: Objective: Prostate cancer, one of the most common cancers in men, is often treated with radiotherapy, which strains both physical and mental health. This study aimed to describe the experiences of men living with prostate cancer shared within conversational support groups during a course of radiotherapy.

metaData.source:
Increased risk of suicide in New South Wales men with prostate cancer: Analysis of linked population-wide data
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29897979/
